note:
I’m middle-aged, agender/enby, bisexual, Jewish, living in the Bay Area with my husband and two kids. I write and paint as hobbies, with thoughts about trying to publish someday.

I’m into speculative fiction, video games, queer liberation, workers rights, puzzles (especially word puzzles), linguistics, architecture, cooking, sewing, gardening, and keeping my bio within character limits.

My kids are not actually named Cassandra and Eloise, these are internet aliases for their privacy.

fields.name: Blog (infrequently updated)
